title: Chat
body:
Hi! :)
I actually need your help right now.
When I'm playing, my /all chat doesnt work.. I tried to look in the settings of the game but I can not make it work. It used to work but now I can't.  How can I access it again?

replies.body:
1: If your chat restricted you can't all chat.
2: There is a setting that enables/disables chat, check that.
Thats all about I know.
I don't have any restrictions.. and I can't find the setting you are talking about

The setting can be found in-game (press ESC) under **INTERFACE** and check the box next to '**Show [ALL] Chat (Matched Games)**

Let me know if this fixed it for you. ^.^
